name: Shadows of a Light that Never Was

metadata.name: What’s left
metadata.description:
You’re lost and alone. Invisible to the busy ghosts, hurrying along the corridors, commuting to and from the imagined shores of this island of haunted rooms, casting languid shadows along the walls by some inexplicable, impossible and transitory light. What was there, that leaves an echo for you to find, like a stain in thin air? What has left? What then returns?

3600 x 3600 .PNG
